branchCategory.name: AF20-40, Modular Style Air Filter, Epoxy Coated
branchCategory.description: <p class="MsoNormal">General purpose 5 micron filtration with modular connectivity to other SMC air preparation components.  External surfaces are epoxy coated to provide an economical alternative for extended life in aggressive or washdown environments.<o:p></o:p></p>
